titles.title: CB 77 You Are Worthy, Father, Creator

properties.copyright: Â©1988 McKinney Music, Inc.Van Ness Press, Inc.(Lifeway Christian Resources)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
YOU ARE WORTHY, FATHER, CREATOR.
You are worthy, Savior, Sustainer.
You are worthy, worthy and wonderful;
Worthy of worship and praise.
(Repeat).
